channel.title: Help
channel.description: I set up a no-ip with my ham Ip. i can connect and my friends on ham can too but u gotta be on ham. When i tried my real IP it didnt work. So i need to port forward but im usin wireless so how do i that is htere and tut for it?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Elf_God Elf_God
item.description:
@Elf_God wrote:

no u didnt i need to be able to figure out no-ip

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Redwater55 Redwater55
item.description:
@Redwater55 wrote:

woah woah woah…you cant mix no-ip, ham, and port fowarding up…ill tell ya what i know…i use ham so ill tell you how to use ham. first, make a network by clicking that little triangle thing at the bottom right (after you hit the power button on ham ((bottom left)) ) then you make a network name say…1234scape. Now your all set up after you turn the thing on if it isnt already right click on 1234scape and hit Go Online. Now all you have to do is compile, and run your server and give people your ham name (1234scape) and ip (should say on top of your ham) and your port (should say on run server ((starting ________ server on 0:0:0:0(port)
and thats about it hope i helped!

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

You need to use your hamachi IP-Address to connect to your hamachi server . You can make your hamachi server “No-Ip” if you change the ip address to your hamachi one and set it up like that .

Read full topic
